/** * The attribute group definition schema component traverser. * * <attributeGroup * id = ID * name = NCName * ref = QName * {any attributes with non-schema namespace . . .}> * Content: (annotation?, ((attribute | attributeGroup)*, anyAttribute?)) * </attributeGroup> * * @xerces.internal * * @author Rahul Srivastava, Sun Microsystems Inc. * @author Sandy Gao, IBM * * @version $Id: XSDAttributeGroupTraverser.java,v 1.15 2004/12/20 05:43:36 mrglavas Exp $ */
